Based on your preferences, I would recommend two movies that might interest you.

Firstly, if you're interested in the world of filmmaking and the people who work behind the scenes, then "The Departed" is a must-watch movie.

Directed by Martin Scorsese, "The Departed" stars Leonardo DiCaprio, Edward Norton, and Tom Hanks.

In this movie, we witness the events leading up reaping a huge reward for the police department. The story also revolves around two detectives: Digno (DiCaprio) and Maceo (Norton). They are trying to solve the murder of an innocent man named Charlie Costello (Hanks)).

conversation.text:
Based on the preferences and cues you provided, I would recommend "The Equalizer" (2014). 

This movie stars Denzel Washington as Jack McCall, a former CIA assassin turned private detective who is hired by businessman James West to find his missing daughter Sarah. 

As McCall delves deeper into the mystery surrounding Sarah's disappearance, he discovers that she has been kidnapped by an elusive and dangerous criminal known only by the code name "Hannibal". 

To rescue Sarah from the clutches of Hannibal, McCall must team up with the FBI and a special team of forensic experts who are also highly skilled at hand-to-hand combat.
